metadata.Title: CVE-2013-1834 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: notes/edit.php in Moodle 1.9.x through 1.9.19, 2.x through 2.1.10, 2.2.xbefore 2.2.8, 2.3.x before 2.3.5, and 2.4.x before 2.4.2 allows remoteauthenticated users to reassign notes via a modified (1) userid or (2)courseid field.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
